question: "..when the three planets are in eclipse.." "..the black hole like a door is open... Evil comes ... sowing terror and chaos..." See? The snake, Billy. The Ultimate Evil ... make sure you get the snake! ..if this is the five..and this the thousand.. Every five thousand years..
answer: I will take it to them my son. Go with God.. be safe from Evil..

question: "..then arrange the elements of life against the Terror just so.." "..Water..fire..earth..air..four elements around the fifth.." Aziz! Light!
answer: Lord forgive me.. they already know too, much..

question: "..in which all the history of the Universe resides ..all the strength..all the hope..Protect us from Evil.."
answer: Amen..

question: Father.. it in the most extraordinary thing.. the greatest find in history..can you imagine the implications.
answer: Only too well... here you must be parched..

question: I mean look.. it is like a battle plan.. Here the Good.. Here the Evil.. Here.. A weapon against evil. Amazing! I am going to be famous.
answer: Then let us toast to your fame! Here Billy.. Drink!

question: To fame.. salud.. We cannot toast with water.. Billy ! In my sack.. the Grappa! "..this perfect person.. this perfect being.." I do not understand this.. perfect? Where is that boy? Billy! And this divine Light they talk about.. what is Divine light? Aziz light! Better.. this is the most unbelievable thing I have ever seen.. ...Uh, yes?
answer: Master... He was about to discover everything, but I had the situation under control.

question: Who are you? Are you Germans? Sprechen Sie Deutsch?
answer: What did I do wrong?

question: The Fifth Element...
answer: Take them and put them in a safe place.

question: Will the elements be gone now forever from this place?
answer: When mankind comes to its senses. We will return.

question: Knowing mankind as I do, that could take centuries!
answer: Time is of no importance, only life is important. When EVIL returns so shall we.

question: We will be ready, Lord. No!!! Don't!!!
answer: A mission is a mission, Savoia. You'll learn that. My apologies to General Kroi -- and my wife..

question: Staedert, do you read me?
answer: I can hear you, Mr. President, but I can't see you .

question: Is that better?
answer: Perfect, Mr. President.

question: I have to address the Supreme Council in 10 minutes. Just the facts, General.
answer: There are no results from the chemical and molecular analysis as of yet, all the calibers are overshot..we're hoping a thermo nucleatic imaging..

question: What you are saying is you don't know what this..thing..is.
answer: Not yet Sir..The only thing we know is it just keeps getting bigger!

question: Options.
answer: Wait or act.

question: Recommendations.
answer: My philosophy Mr. President is shoot first ask questions later. I don't like uninvited guests.

question: Gentlemen? No... it's just getting bigger. The security of the Federated Territories is and remains number one priority. I suppose General Staedert's "philosophy" is acceptable to you? All right, then! Staedert?
answer: Mr. President?

question: ...Yes?
answer: Cornelius, Vito Cornelius. 50th level parish. I have a different theory to offer you, Mr. President.

question: I'm coming. Yeah?
answer: Hey bud! Finger here.

question: Hi sweetie!
answer: I love you too Major, but you haven't called me that since basic training.

question: I was talking to the cat.
answer: Oh, yeah, I forgot.You still prefer your cat to the real thing.

question: At least, the cat comes back.
answer: You still pining for that two timing bitch. Forget her. There are a million women out there.

question: I don't want a million - I just want one. A perfect one.
answer: Don't exist bud.

question: I just found a picture of you.
answer: How do I look?

question: Like shit.
answer: Must be an old picture.. Listen, you gotta bring me your hack for the 6 month overhaul. A.S.A.P.

question: I don't need one.
answer: You forgetting who sat next to you for a thousand missions. I know how you drive.

question: Finger! I'm driving a cab now, not a space fighter!!
answer: How many points you got left on your license?

question: Uh... at least fifty.
answer: In your dreams! See you tonight!

question: We have forty-eight hours, the time it needs to adapt itself to our living conditions.
answer: And then?

question: And then it will be too late. The goal of evil is to wipe out life! All forms of life. For all eternity...Life upsets it.
answer: Is there anything that can stop it?

question: Yes..thank God.. The Mondoshawans don't belong to the Federated Territories, but they are peaceful... in their possession are the four elements of life. These elements when they are gathered around a fifth ..will produce what the ancients called the light of creation, the light of total goodness which is the only thing that can defeat EVIL.
answer: But what happens if instead of this... Ultimate Warrior... it is EVIL who stands here?

question: Don't watch it all day, it'll rot your mind. Bye sweetie..
answer: The cash man!

question: Been here long?
answer: Don't fuck with me man or I'll blow you into tomorrow!

question: Isn't that a Z140? Alleviated titanium. Neuro charged assault model?
answer: Uh..

question: You know you could hurt someone with this puppy..good thing it's not loaded..
answer: It's not?

question: You gotta push the little yellow button...
answer: Thanks..

question: You're welcome.. ..you know these things are VERY illegal.. you could get in a shit load of trouble.. I better hang onto it for you..
answer: Please enter your license.. Welcome on board Mr. Dallas..

question: How you doing this morning? Sleep OK? I didn't.
answer: Fuel level 6.03..Propulsion 2x4...

question: I had the worst goddamn nightmare.
answer: You have nine points left on your license..

question: Thanks for reminding me..
answer: Have a nice day..

question: This is all that survived?
answer: Actually only one cell survived..

question: Have you identified it?
answer: It's not that easy..we've never encountered anything like it before..you see normal human beings have 40 DNA memo groums..which is more than enough for any species to perpetuate itself..This one has 200,000.

question: Talk English Doc.
answer: This cell is like a huge library. It has infinite genetic knowledge stored inside. Almost like it was...engineered.

question: Sounds like a freak of nature to me.
answer: Yes... I can't wait to meet him. The compositional elements of his DNA chain are the same as ours, there are simply more of them tightly packed. His knowledge is probably limitless..

question: Is there any danger? Some kind of virus?
answer: We put it through the cellular hygiene detector. The cell is for lack of a better word... perfect.

question: OK, go ahead! But Mr. Perfect better be polite... otherwise I turn him into cat food.
answer: ...This is the crucial phase, The reconstruction of pigment. Cells are bombarded with slightly greasy solar atoms which forces the body cells to react, to protect themselves. That means growing skin. Clever, eh?

question: Wonderful!
answer: Activate life support system. Remove the shield. I told you ... perfect!

question: We'll wait till things quiet down a bit. You mind?
answer: ...Priest...

question: You're not that bad... Come on we'll get you to a doctor.
answer: Vito... Cor... Ni-lious... Priest...

question: Vito Cornelius? Excuse me, I'm looking for a priest.
answer: Weddings are one floor down. Congratulations.

question: She's not my bride, she's my fare. She's looking for this Vito Cornelius. According to the phone guide he lives here.
answer: That's me. But I don't know who she is... where did you find her?

question: She dropped in on me... holding this.
answer: The fifth element.

question: Finger's gonna kill me...
answer: Who are you?

question: I brought the girl remember?
answer: The girl?

question: Yeah! She dropped in on me. I mean on my taxi... talking... this... this bizarre language...
answer: He's a she!

question: You noticed...
answer: There's not a moment to lose! Wake her up, but be gentle about it! This woman is mankind's most precious possession! She is... perfect!

question: So you do know her.
answer: Uh yes, we're cousins..distant cousins..

question: Perfect...
answer: It's a miracle!!!

question: ...What's your name?
answer: Leeloo Minai Lekarariba-Laminai-Tchai Ekbat De Sebat.

question: Hey, that's... cute... Do you have a nickname, something a little... shorter?
answer: ...Leeloo.

question: Absolutely sure There's the triple suns on her gloves!
answer: They all like this in your family, father?

question: She's an exception.. Thank you so much for your help Mr...?
answer: Dallas. Korben Dallas.

question: Yes. That's fine! Thank you very much. A thousand times over!
answer: I might call to check up on her, you know... to see if she's better?

question: She's fine, really..don't you worry.. just needs some rest..she's had a very long trip.
answer: I know. I was there when she arrived. Excuse me! Just one thing! She said something to me a while ago and... I don't really get it... Akta Gamat?

question: It means, "Never without my permission".
answer: That's what I thought. ...Thanks. Evening...

question: ...Thanks... You, too. Oh god. I forgot your food ... I'm really sorry! How about a nice Thai nosh to apologize? How does that sound, huh? Hello?
answer: Hey bud...I'm waiting all day here.

question: Finger..man..I'm sorry..listen..I was on the way over but I had a fare fall into my lap.. y'know one of those big fares you just can't resist..
answer: So, just how big was this fare?

question: 5'7", green eyes... long legs... great skin... perfect..
answer: Uh huh..and I don't suppose you got the name of this..perfect fare..

question: Perfect.
answer: Domo danko!

question: Leeloo? The Stones... We must get them back.
answer: Ikset-kiba. Me imanetaba oum dalat!

question: You know exactly where they are!
answer: Aknot? Is that you? ...What an ugly face! Doesn't suit you at all! Take it off... That's better! Never be ashamed of who you are... You're warriors... be proud... So what if the Federal Army crushed your entire race and scattered your people to the wind... Your time for revenge is at hand... Voila... the ZF1. ...It's light... the handle's adjustable for easy carrying... good for righties and lefties. ... Breaks down into four parts, undetectable by X-rays.. It's the ideal weapon for quick, discreet interventions. A word on fire power ... and replay sends every following shot to the same location... I recharge, but the enemy has launched a cowardly sneak attack from behind, the automirror takes care of that. Gives me the time to turn around and finish the job. 300 round bursts, then there are the Zorg oldies... ...Rocket launcher. The always efficient flame thrower... My favorite. Our famous net launcher, the arrow launcher, with exploding or poisonous gas heads - very practical. And for the grand finale, the all-new ice-cube system! ...Four full crates, delivered right on time! What about you, my dear Aknot, did you bring me what I asked you for? ...Magnificent.

question: What do you mean empty?
answer: Alright..I've got an open mind here.. anyone care to explain?

question: So you forgive me?
answer: Not going to open?

question: I've never gotten a message that wasn't bad news.
answer: How someone strong like you scared from a message? Is good news I sure!

question: The last two messages I got? The first one was from my wife telling me she was leaving! And the second was from my lawyer telling me he was leaving too... with my wife.
answer: You right that is bad.. but mathematically luck must change! Grandfather say ...You're fired. Oh!

question: At least I won lunch.
answer: Good philosophy..see good in bad.. I like..I prepare number one dessert.. special for you and pussy..

question: Good work, my son. Now all we need is a way to get there. I'll get it. Finish your work my son.
answer: Father Cornelius?

question: My son?
answer: Mr. Zorg would like a word with you.

question: Mr. Who?
answer: Zorg. Jean-Baptiste Emmanuel Zorg... nice to see you again

question: I remember you now..the so called art dealer.
answer: I'm glad you got your memory back, Father... Because you're going to need it... Where are the stones?

question: ...Why on earth do the stones interest you?
answer: Personally, they are of no interest to me, I'd rather sell weapons..but I have a customer... so tell me...

question: Even it I did know where the stones were I would never tell somebody like you.
answer: Why? What's wrong with me?

question: ...I'm a priest! I'm here to serve life, All you want to do is destroy it.
answer: Ah, Father... You are so wrong. Let me explain... ...would you like a drink?

question: No thank you.
answer: Follow me.. Life, which you so nobly serve, comes from destruction. Look at this empty glass. Here it is... peaceful... serene... but if it is... Destroyed... ...Look at all these little things... so busy all of a sudden. Notice how each one is useful. What a lovely ballet, so full of form and color. So full of..life!

question: They are robots!
answer: Yes but... by that simple gesture of destruction. I gave work to at least fifty people today. The engineers, the technicians, the mechanics. Fifty people who will be able to feed their children so they can grow up big and strong. Children who will have children of their own, adding to the great cycle of life! Father, by creating a little destruction, I am, in fact, encouraging life! So, in reality, you and I are in the same business!

question: Destroying a glass is one thing..killing people with the weapons you produce is quite another.
answer: Let me reassure you Father..I will never kill more people in my entire life than religion has killed in the last 2000 years.

question: Where's the robot to pat your back? Can I give you a hand?
answer: You saved my life... So, I'm going to spare yours. Throw him out!

question: You are a monster, Zorg!
answer: I know... ...Torture whoever you want, the president if you have to but I want those Stones. You have an hour.

question: Why the hell is it eating up all those satellites like that? It should only choke on them.
answer: I managed to contact the Mondoshawan. They deplore the incident, but accept our apologies.

question: And the Stones? Did you find them in the wreckage?
answer: The-Stones weren't aboard the ship.

question: ...What do you mean?
answer: The Mondoshawan never fully trusted the human race..they felt we're too unpredictable.. so they gave up the Stones to somebody they do trust. Her name is Plavalaguna. She's a Diva and she's going to sing at the charity ball on Fhloston Paradise in a few hours. She has the Stones with her.

question: Excellent! I want your best man on this!
answer: Don't worry, Sir. I have the perfect one.

question: Saved by the bell. ...Hello?
answer: You're the nastiest dirtbag I know in this stinking City!

question: Hi Ma...
answer: I've been playing twice a week for 20 years, 20 years I've been eating those shitty croquettes. You wouldn't even eat one to help your poor mother, and you win the big prize? Know something? The whole thing makes me sick! Are you listening to me, you ingrate!

question: Yes ma.. Go on... This is gonna take a while! Other than that... You all right?
answer: ...And now you're making fun of me? I'm warning you! If you don't take me after all these years of sacrifice, I'll never forgive you!!

question: I'm coming!. Ma, what're you talking about?
answer: I get it! You want to make me beg, is that it?

question: All I want is an explanation! I just got in, I lost my job. I smashed my cab. I got mugged, but other than that everything's peachy, Ma, thanks for asking!! Now settle down and explain to me calmly..
answer: You just won a trip, you dolt! Ten days in Fhloston Paradise for two!

question: Ma. If I'd won, I'd know about it. Someone would have notified me.
answer: They've been blaring out your name on the radio for the last hour, blockhead!

question: Ma.. it's the door. I'll call you back.
answer: Major Dallas, if our calculations are correct you still have 57 hours owed to the Federal Army on your enlistment which is more than you will need for a mission of the utmost importance.

question: What mission?
answer: To save the world.

question: Where have I heard this song before?
answer: You're to leave immediately for Fhloston Paradise. Retrieve four Stones from the Diva Plavalaguna. And bring them back with the utmost discretion as possible. Any questions'?

question: Just one... why me?
answer: Three reasons... One Two

question: And the third one?
answer: You're the only one left alive... Don't you open your messages?

question: I've had enough good news for today
answer: You have won the annual Gemini contest and a trip to Fhloston Paradise. For two. Congratulations. Here are your tickets.

question: You rigged the contest?
answer: Major Iceborg will accompany you... as your wife...

question: You couldn't come up with something a little more discreet?
answer: Old tricks are the best tricks eh?

question: I'm not going.
answer: Why not?

question: One reason... I want to stay the only one left alive. ...Scuse me. ...Shit!
answer: What is it?

question: It's my wife.
answer: I thought you were divorced.

question: I mean my future.. my ex.. My future ex.. if she sees you here I'm finished. She hates you guys. It's what killed us in the first place. Please... ...Sorry, General, but we've got no choice! It'll only take a minute! Let me set up another meeting and I'll be back.
answer: Three of us will never fit in there!

question: I suppose that means "Hi" ?
answer: I'm sorry to have to resort to such methods, but we heard about your good luck on he radio and we need the tickets to Fhloston.

question: Is that the usual way priests go on vacation?
answer: We're not going on vacation..we're on a mission..

question: What kind of mission?
answer: We have to save the world.

question: Good luck..
answer: Of course.

question: I'm really sorry.. there wasn't time. Here let me wrap you up. ..It's funny. I've met you twice today and you've ended up in my arms both times.
answer: Valo massa... Chacha hamas.

question: Uh..you're welcome. Coffee! That's what you need! A nice, hot cup of coffee! With some honey! You'll see, honey's great!... A hot cup of coffee... with honey... I've got this great honey somewhere. You know about honey? There used to be these little animals who made it with antenna... ..and these other animals who ate it.. one were bees the other were bears.. I forget which ate it and which made it but.. Here it is! Taste this... It... melts in your mouth, doesn't it? You hear that?
answer: Cornelius..

question: Oh god! I'm really sorry.. let me help you..
answer: Achta ge lumitai de matala..

question: What?
answer: Vano da, mechteba?! Soun domo kala chon hammas!

question: Yeah...
answer: Make that two...

question: Where's Leeloo?
answer: On the plane... with Mr. Dallas... the real one.

question: You gotta be kidding!
answer: Korben Dallas! Here he is The most hated man in the universe. The one and only winner of the Gemini Croquette contest! Ladies, start melting 'cause the boy's hot! Hot! Hot! The boy is perfect.. ...The right size, right build, right hair. Right on! Say something-to those 50 billion pair of ears out there D-man!

question: ...Hi.
answer: Does it get any better or what! ...Quiver ladies, he's gonna set the world on fire right here from 5 to 7! You'll know everything there is to know about the D-man. His dreams, his desires, his most intimate of intimates. And from what I'm looking at intimate is the stud muffin's middle name. So tell me my main man... you nervous in the service?

question: Uh... not really.
answer: Freeze those knees, my chickadees, 'cause Korben is on the case with a major face... ...Start drooling, ladies! My man here is a sharp-tongued Sire who's gonna stroke your every desire. Yesterday's unknown will be tomorrow's Prince of Fhloston Paradise, the hotel of a thousand and one follies, home of luxury and beauty. A magic fountain flowing with non-stop wine, women and Bootchie Koochie Koo... Beware out there puppy dogs my man is on the prowl. Owwww! ...And start licking your stamps little girls, this guy's gonna have you writing home to Momma! Tomorrow from 5 to 7, I'll be your voice, your tongue and I'll be hot on the tail of the sexiest man of the year... D-man... Your man... My man. Korben sweetheart do me a favor I know this is probably the biggest thing that ever happened to you in your inconsequential life. But I've got a show to do here and it's got to pop. So tomorrow, when we're on air, give me a hand... Try to make believe you have more than a one word vocabulary. OK pal?

question: I didn't come here to play Dumbo on the radio. So tomorrow between 5 and 7 give yourself a hand, that clear pal?
answer: Crystal.

question: ...Mr. Dallas... Korben Dallas?
answer: That's right.

question: The problem is I only have one Korben Dallas on my list... and he's already checked in.
answer: That's impossible! He's in j... I mean, there must be some mistake. I have my ticket! I'm the real Korben Dallas!

question: I'm sorry, sir, boarding is finished.
answer: I want to see your boss! Get rid of this fucking window! Somebody's made a mistake, goddamnit!

question: Apipoulai!
answer: Not hard to find you...just follow the Chaos... Leeloo, listen to me... these tickets... they're not mine... I mean they are, but not for vacation like everyone thinks... I'm on an operation... and if I didn't come get you, you'd be in a shitload of trouble... I'd love to be on vacation with you... but now.... now I've got to work... And Leeloo... I would love to work in peace.

question: Love...
answer: Yes! But "love" isn't the operative word here, PEACE is!

question: Peace... and love...
answer: Sometimes you can't learn everything from a screen..sometimes it's better to ask someone who has experience..

question: What is... Make Love?
answer: Know what? On that subject maybe you'd be better off asking the screen.

question: OK! Finished!
answer: Finished what?

question: Learning language.
answer: Which one?

question: All 900.
answer: You learned 900 languages in five minutes?!

question: Yes! Now it's your turn! I learned your language, you have to learn mine!
answer: I know how to say "Hello". Teach me how to say "Good-bye", that's all I need.

question: Apipoussan!
answer: Apipoussan?

question: Good! Do you know how we say "make love"?
answer: Uh...

question: ...Hoppi-hoppa.
answer: Help...

question: Yes... Zorg here.
answer: Am I disturbing you?

question: No... not at all. Where are you?
answer: ...Not far, now.

question: Really? Maybe I can get you on my screen and see you at last!
answer: Do you have the picture now Mr. Zorg?

question: Got it.
answer: How's our deal coming along?

question: Fine, just fine! I'll have the 4 pieces you asked for any time now. But it wasn't easy. My costs have tripled.
answer: Money is of no importance... I want the Stones!

question: The Stones will be here. I'll see to it personally!
answer: ...I can't wait to be among you.

question: Pardon me. Excuse me. I'm trying to reach my wife.. Sorry!
answer: My main man! Please don't leave me here alone. My head's killing me and my adoring fans are gonna tear me apart! Get me outta here!

question: I'll take you to the bar, after that, you're on your own.
answer: Oh, yes! Do that! You treat me right, man. Tell me all about yourself, your roots, your personal life, your childhood dreams...

question: I don't think this is a good time...
answer: ...You got brothers and sisters? What about your dad? Tell me about your dad! What was he like? Physically? Big, I suppose?

question: Yeah, very big, a giant.
answer: I didn't have a dad... never saw him... never even heard him. 50 billion people listen to me every day... and he doesn't hear me...

question: For the concert it says formal attire... I didn't bring... Hello?
answer: You little sleaze bag!

question: ...Ma???
answer: Don't you ever ask me for another thing in my life again, you've killed your poor mother with your own hands!

question: Listen, Ma! I've only got a few days vacation and I'll be damned if I'm gonna spend them on the phone. ...Hang on, it's the door. No! I told you I didn't bring anybody! I'm all alone... as usual! ...I'll call you back. Here we go again...
answer: You know women normally change five times more than men.

question: You get that off the screen?
answer: Yes... you know there's a lot of differences between men women.

question: You noticed..
answer: OK, you can turn around!

question: Where you going?
answer: I'm going to see the Diva sing. What's the matter?... Do I look bad?

question: No, not at all! I mean, just the opposite, you're... you're beautiful!
answer: Do you know how this works?

question: I have an idea. I told you I need to work in peace. Remember? I need to concentrate.
answer: And you can't concentrate with me around?.

question: It's difficult. Army issue. I'm sorry.
answer: You're nothing but a... a...

question: I was sent by the government to help you.
answer: Don't worry. This is my fate... How was the concert?

question: I've never heard anything so beautiful in my life.
answer: You're a good man... She was right to have chosen you...

question: Who?
answer: The Fifth Element... The Supreme Being... Your wife...

question: Leeloo... is... she's...
answer: Yes, and more than that... You must give her the Stones, she's the only one who knows how to use them.

question: She needs you. She needs your help and your love. She's more fragile than she seems...
answer: ...Yeah, so am I.

question: She was taught to love the life of others... but not her own. You have to teach her to love if you want her to truly live!
answer: I'll help her, I promise, but I think you should tell me where the Stones are!

question: Do you love her?
answer: I... I don't know! We hardly know each other... it takes time!

question: I don't have time... I need to know.
answer: Listen, the last time I admitted to a woman I loved her ... I never saw her again.

question: I would like to have died in peace...
answer: You tell me to save the world then you go off and leave me in the shit! Come on! You're not gonna die in peace! You're not going to die at all! You hear me? Where are the Stones? I'm sorry, but... the Stones...

question: They are... with me...
answer: ...The Stones are with me? ...In me?

question: ...The Stones are with me? ...In me?
answer: Don't you think we'd better be going?

question: That's it... I've had... all day people have been sticking guns in my face...
answer: Korben man... These dudes are going to waste us if we don't do what they say.

question: You don't do what I say... I'll waste you myself. Got it?
answer: Got it...

question: We got to find the leader. Mangalores don't fight without a leader.
answer: One more shot and we start killing hostages, got that?

question: Found him...
answer: Send someone to negotiate!

question: You're probably very angry with me and I quite understand. But I want you to know I'm fighting for a noble cause.
answer: Yeah, I know... to save the world... but right now all I want to do is save Leeloo.

question: Leeloo's in trouble?
answer: When is she not in trouble?

question: Maybe we oughta be going, what do you think?
answer: Not without Leeloo.

question: Like D-Man, I hate to bother you but uh, like, we're down to 2 minutes here...
answer: It's the latest model.. I've never seen one before... it works off a magnetic coded card... Let's see if I can rig it up.

question: Hey! What are you doing? The bomb!
answer: Don't worry, I'm here now! Just relax. I've got the Stones. Everything's going to be fine.

question: Like Korben, can I have 30 seconds of your time here?
answer: I'll be right back.

question: Apipoulai..
answer: I'm so very sad.

question: Why? We did pretty well, wouldn't you say?
answer: Five hundred wars... Arms... Drugs... Money... Everything you create is used to destroy...

question: I told you not to read all that crap!
answer: Protect life... Until death.

question: No. It's much simpler. If we don't figure out where these Stones go in five minutes, we're all dead! Think you got it? There's no light! You told me there were supposed to be four beams of light.
answer: Yes, of course, but... The Stones are shut! They have to be open for it to work.

question: And you don't know how they open, is that what you are saying?
answer: That's what I'm saying.

question: Leeloo? The Stones! We have to open them! How does it work?
answer: The wind blows... the fire burns...

question: I know all that, Leeloo! I'm talking about the Stones.
answer: ...The rain falls...

question: ...we'll never make it. It... it moved! Korben! Korben!
answer: What did you say? What did you do?

question: Nothing! Swear to God, I didn't do nothing!
answer: Look, you did something that set it off. Try to remember. Concentrate. Tell me exactly what you did!!

question: I was like this... With my hands here and... I said, "We'll never make it!" That's all!
answer: Is that all?

question: Yeah... then I sighed... like this.
answer: The wind! The wind blows... Quickly, everyone on a Stone! Water for water! Fire for fire! Earth for earth!

question: I don't have a light. I stopped smoking last week! If we'd come a bit sooner...
answer: Don't breathe.

question: It's up to you now, Angel!
answer: I'm so tired...

question: You can sleep tomorrow... come on...
answer: I want to sleep... forever...

question: Leeloo! If you don't get on with the program we're all gonna die! And that's not on my agenda for today.
answer: What's the use of saving lives... when you see what you do with them!

question: You're right but there are lots of good things... beautiful things...
answer: ...Like love...

question: Exactly.
answer: But I don't know love... I'm like a machine programmed to save other people's lives but never to have one of my own. I have thousands of memories but none of them are mine... There is no need for me other than this. I'm immortal but I have no life.

question: Yes, you do! I need you. More than you can imagine! Stand up straight!
answer: Why?... Why would you need me?
